name: Project Boost (Marc T.)
description:
How to Play:

Use the A and D keys to steer your Rocket.

Press the Space Key to Boost.

Press the Escape Key to bring up the Pause Menu in game

Project Boost:

Project Boost is a Physics based game made in Unity. In it you must fly your rocket from a starting point in a level to the landing pad at the end. Touching anything besides the starting and ending points of the level will cause your rocket to explode. Along the way you will have to navigate various hazards that can obstruct your path.

Developer Note:

The game does have sound though it may not appear that way in the trailer. A mishap during the video editing process caused the sound track to be lost somewhere along the way.

It has been noted on some hardware that textures in the game do not all appear as they should. This is most noticeable in the case of water which has at least one occasion been reported to be completely opaque.
